activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11406
activity.text: I'd like to work on this issue. I've made the changes locally so far. I have removed the Tooltip Component which was wrapped over the button component responsible for showing "Expand/Collapse" and "See Details" buttons. As we don't require the tooltip anymore, I've removed that component as well as necessary imports. Expected Timeline: March 19th, 2025 Outcome: The tooltip isn't visible anymore
